reviews.review: Portals and robots what more do you need

눈물의 모녀레즈물. 
당신은 과거의 폭력이 남긴 질척하고 미끈한 통로를 따라서 인도됩니다. 감자도스는 연약한 몸체를 그대로 드러낸 채 당신을 기다리고 있습니다. 당신은 글라도스와 함께하지 않을 수 없습니다. 그건 글라도스를 당신이 연민해서이기도 하고, 게임이 그렇게밖에는 진행되지 않아서이기도 합니다.
норм игруха было бы круто сервера сандбокса типо куча игроков и они своё строят и играют

Well here we are again
It's always such a pleasure
Remember when you tried to kill me twice?
Oh how we laughed and laughed
Except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice
You want your freedom? Take it

But now I only want you gone

Maybe not quite as heavy
Now little Caroline is in here too
One day they woke me up
So I could live forever

Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would be funny
if it weren't so sad
Well you have been replaced

Now I only want you gone

Portal 2 is a superior sequel when compared to the first portal game so either buy them as a pack or just buy portal 2. It introduces a new co-op mode which is fun when you are able to have fun with (or sabotage) your friends. The best thing about this game is the story and how it connects more with the audience and it's comedic touch of humour. Also there are new game mechanics (which I will not spoil) which improved the game by a vast quantity. If you are looking for a fun game to play, then play this.
Çok iyi ama son bölümler biraz zorladı
Amazing game. The puzzles were challenging, the story was enticing, the characters were brilliant; it's certainly worth playing through Portal 1 and 2.

A fun puzzle game with a fun story. Definitely one of my favorites!

I mean it's Portal 2, it's a cult classic, if you have Steam you should own and play Portal 1 and 2. 
Graphics - The graphics are still beautiful even with today's standards, and the atmosphere is immense
Story - The voice acting is impeccable, especially GLADOS and J.K.Simmons
EVERYONE SHOULD PLAY IT
I don't like puzzle games, but this one is actually legit good, check it out, bonus, great sound and music design and there's a decent enough optional plot if you care at it.

Très bon jeu de réflexion et de coop. La communauté est toujours présente pour proposer de nouvelles maps.

Playing this game in 2022, and have to say, its one of the best games I've played ever. Do give it a try, if you haven't already. Would be cool to get a remaster some day, and I would purchase it again!

Прямое олицетворение дотеров, которые лучше тебя знают твоих родителей. А так игрушка очень прикольная, особенно когда боевые боты при отключении говорят что не ненавидят и не винят тебя. Идеальный баланс между оскорблением и прощением)
Maybe the best game ever created. From an era where people made things for the sake of the art.
Tardé 7.5 horas en pasarme el juego, y aun quedan 35 logros mas, este juego hara que tus nervios esten bajo 0, pero muy divertidas las voces de los robots.
不愧为世界上最伟大的游戏之一

За все 8 часов проведенных в этой игре, мнение у меня осталось позитивное об этой игре. Как сиквел 1 части он прекрассен все те же головоломки с портальной пушкой, сюжет интересный. Всем тем у кого есть средства на эту игру советую ее купить и в нее сыграть.
